story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: You wanted to ask us something?
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yes. Apologies for interrupting your training...
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: No problem at all! Ask away!
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Then I’ll cut to the chase.
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’d like to know how you two attained your
arc suits.
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
How did you demonstrate your true bond with
your Pokémon?
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: For me, I had to train harder than ever before.
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Same. I had to surpass my limits through trials and
hardship. It was more than I’d ever experienced.
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
(A trial my Pokémon and I can overcome—and
grow together from...)
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: Sounds like you’ve found your answer, then!
story_arceus_03_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: It won’t be easy, but do your best, N!
